name: Normativa former
description: It's worth mentioning that pronouns ≠ gender. One can still be nonbinary while using pronouns that are congruent with (or opposite to) their gender assigned at birth.

name: Semi-normativa former
description: Those pronouns have been in common use in normative Swedish already, but recently they got a slightly different new usage: describing a single, specific person.

name: Neopronomen
description: Unlike the other pronouns, which have always been officially recognised as “grammatically correct”, neopronouns are novel. However, they are increasingly popular and are gaining more official recognition.
